title: RT News - October 06, 2019 (12:00 MSK)
text: In the US, Democrats demand protection for the whistleblower at the heart of the Trump impeachment inquiry in a dramatic departure from the way other key informants have been treated there. As people in India and around the world mark 150 years since the birth of Mahatma Gandhi seen as an icon of non-violent resistance posters of his image are defaced in some regions, blighting celebrations. Flashing the 'OK' hand gesture is apparently 'not OK' anymore. It's now branded a hate symbol, and got one theme park worker the sack in the US. It's also fired up debate here.
description: In the US, Democrats demand protection for the whistleblower at the heart of the Trump impeachment inquiry in a dramatic departure from the way other key informants have been treated there
